Churchville-Chili Budget and Board Election Results: Proposition 1, the Churchville-Chili Central School District’s 2020-21 Budget of $88,467,407 was approved by the community via absentee ballot, with a total of 2,394 “yes” votes to 906 “no” votes for a total of 3,300 votes.

Proposition 2, which allows for the purchase of ten new school buses of various configurations at an estimated maximum cost of $1,210,000, was approved with 2,224 “yes” votes to 1,058 “no” votes for a total of 3,283 votes.

Candidates Mike Iacucci (incumbent), Amy Wilson (incumbent), and Kristen Brumbaugh (incumbent) have been elected to the Board of Education, effective July 1, 2020. They received 2,717; 2,659 and 2,641 votes, respectively.
